quiz.question: pounce __ ____
quiz.explanation: 猛扑，猛扑猎物。The cat would pounce on prey with lightning speed. 猫会以闪电般的速度猛扑猎物。

quiz.question: ___ ___ reminisce
quiz.explanation: 回忆，坐下来回忆。The old friends would sit and reminisce about their school days. 老朋友们会坐下来回忆他们的学生时代。

quiz.question: _________ deduce
quiz.explanation: 推断，逻辑推断。Sherlock Holmes could logically deduce the solution from small clues. 夏洛克·福尔摩斯可以从小线索中逻辑地推断出答案。

quiz.question: puce _____
quiz.explanation: 紫褐色，紫褐色连衣裙。She wore an elegant puce dress to the evening gala. 她穿着一件优雅的紫褐色连衣裙参加晚宴。

quiz.question: ______ barricade
quiz.explanation: 路障，警察路障。Officers set up a police barricade to control the crowd. 警察设置了警察路障来控制人群。

quiz.question: ______ marmalade
quiz.explanation: 果酱，橙子果酱。She spread thick orange marmalade on her morning toast. 她在早餐吐司上涂了厚厚的橙子果酱。

quiz.question: ________ serenade
quiz.explanation: 小夜曲，浪漫小夜曲。The guitarist performed a romantic serenade under her window. 吉他手在她的窗下演奏了一首浪漫小夜曲。

quiz.question: _____ grenade
quiz.explanation: 手榴弹，投掷手榴弹。The soldier was trained to throw grenade with precision. 士兵接受训练以精确投掷手榴弹。

quiz.question: ______ spade
quiz.explanation: 铁锹，园艺铁锹。The gardener used a sharp garden spade to dig the flower bed. 园丁用锋利的园艺铁锹挖花坛。

quiz.question: dissuade _______
quiz.explanation: 劝阻，劝阻某人。They tried to dissuade someone from making a rash decision. 他们试图劝阻某人做出草率的决定。

quiz.question: evade _____
quiz.explanation: 逃避，逃税。The businessman was arrested for attempting to evade taxes. 这位商人因试图逃税而被捕。

quiz.question: ____ pervade
quiz.explanation: 弥漫，恐惧弥漫。A sense of unease would fear pervade the abandoned building. 一种不安感会在废弃建筑中弥漫恐惧。

quiz.question: recede ____ ________
quiz.explanation: 后退，消失在远方。The ship's lights would recede into distance as it sailed away. 船驶离时，船上的灯光会消失在远方。

quiz.question: precede ______
quiz.explanation: 在...之前，演讲之前。A moment of silence would precede speech at the memorial. 在纪念活动上，演讲之前会有片刻的沉默。

quiz.question: concede ______
quiz.explanation: 承认，承认失败。The candidate was forced to concede defeat after the final count. 在最终计票后，候选人被迫承认失败。

quiz.question: ____ stampede
quiz.explanation: 惊跑，野性的惊跑。A wild stampede of buffalo thundered across the plain. 一群野牛的惊跑在平原上轰鸣而过。

quiz.question: impede ________
quiz.explanation: 阻碍，阻碍进展。Bureaucratic red tape can impede progress on important projects. 官僚繁文缛节会阻碍重要项目的进展。

quiz.question: bide ____
quiz.explanation: 等待，等待时机。The hunter would bide time until the perfect moment to strike. 猎人会等待时机直到完美的出击时刻。

quiz.question: confide __ ______
quiz.explanation: 倾诉，向朋友倾诉。She needed someone to confide in friend about her troubles. 她需要有人能向朋友倾诉她的烦恼。

quiz.question: chide ______
quiz.explanation: 责备，温和地责备。The teacher would chide gently when students forgot their homework. 当学生忘记作业时，老师会温和地责备。

quiz.question: snide ______
quiz.explanation: 讥讽的，讥讽的评论。His snide remark about her appearance was completely uncalled for. 他对她外貌的讥讽评论完全不合时宜。

quiz.question: override ____
quiz.explanation: 推翻，推翻否决。Congress voted to override veto with a two-thirds majority. 国会以三分之二多数投票推翻否决。

quiz.question: ____ stride
quiz.explanation: 大步，大步走。The tall man walked with a long stride across the room. 这个高个子男人迈着大步穿过房间。

quiz.question: ___ astride
quiz.explanation: 跨坐，跨坐。The cowboy would sit astride his horse with confidence. 牛仔会自信地跨坐在马上。

quiz.question: floodwaters ______
quiz.explanation: 消退，洪水消退。It took days for the floodwaters subside after the storm. 暴风雨后，洪水花了好几天才消退。

quiz.question: ____ backside
quiz.explanation: 臀部，裸露的臀部。The streaker ran across the field showing his bare backside. 裸奔者跑过场地，露出他裸露的臀部。

quiz.question: underside __ ___
quiz.explanation: 底部，汽车底部。The mechanic inspected the underside of car for damage. 机械师检查了汽车底部是否有损坏。

quiz.question: ________ wayside
quiz.explanation: 路边，路边。They stopped at a roadside wayside rest area for lunch. 他们在路边休息区停下来吃午饭。

quiz.question: ___ betide
quiz.explanation: 降临，祸事降临。Woe betide anyone who crosses the angry king. 任何触怒国王的人都会有祸事降临。

quiz.question: seclude _______
quiz.explanation: 隐居，隐居自己。The writer would seclude oneself in a cabin to work on the novel. 作家会在小屋里隐居以写作小说。

quiz.question: elude _______
quiz.explanation: 躲避，躲避抓捕。The fugitive managed to elude capture for several months. 逃犯设法躲避抓捕好几个月。

quiz.question: delude _______
quiz.explanation: 欺骗，自欺。Don't delude oneself into thinking success comes without effort. 不要自欺认为成功不需要努力。

quiz.question: ________ collude
quiz.explanation: 勾结，秘密勾结。The competitors were accused of trying to secretly collude to fix prices. 竞争者被指控试图秘密勾结操纵价格。

quiz.question: protrude _______
quiz.explanation: 突出，向外突出。The broken bone would protrude outward through the skin. 断骨会向外突出穿过皮肤。

quiz.question: _______ aptitude
quiz.explanation: 天赋，天生的天赋。She demonstrated a natural aptitude for mathematics from an early age. 她从小就表现出数学方面的天生天赋。

quiz.question: ______ servitude
quiz.explanation: 奴役，强制奴役。The prisoners were subjected to years of forced servitude. 囚犯们遭受了多年的强制奴役。

quiz.question: banshee ____
quiz.explanation: 女妖，女妖哀嚎。The eerie banshee wail echoed through the Irish countryside. 诡异的女妖哀嚎在爱尔兰乡村回荡。

quiz.question: ________ glee
quiz.explanation: 欢乐，孩子般的欢乐。The children jumped with childish glee when they saw the presents. 孩子们看到礼物时带着孩子般的欢乐跳了起来。

quiz.question: née _____
quiz.explanation: 娘家姓，娘家姓史密斯。Mrs. Johnson, née Smith, graduated from Harvard in 1990. 约翰逊夫人，娘家姓史密斯，1990年毕业于哈佛大学。

quiz.question: ____ addressee
quiz.explanation: 收信人，亲爱的收信人。The letter began with a formal greeting to the dear addressee. 这封信以对亲爱的收信人的正式问候开始。

quiz.question: goatee _____
quiz.explanation: 山羊胡，山羊胡子。The professor stroked his distinguished goatee beard thoughtfully. 教授若有所思地抚摸着他出众的山羊胡子。

quiz.question: penknife _____
quiz.explanation: 小刀，小刀刀片。He carefully sharpened the penknife blade before carving the wood. 他在雕刻木头前小心地磨快了小刀刀片。

quiz.question: _____ strife
quiz.explanation: 冲突，内部冲突。The nation was torn apart by years of civil strife. 这个国家被多年的内部冲突撕裂了。

quiz.question: birdcage ____
quiz.explanation: 鸟笼，鸟笼门。The parrot escaped when someone left the birdcage door open. 有人没关鸟笼门，鹦鹉逃跑了。

quiz.question: ___ bandage
quiz.explanation: 绷带，手臂绷带。The nurse carefully wrapped an arm bandage around the wound. 护士小心地在伤口周围缠上手臂绷带。

quiz.question: ______ poundage
quiz.explanation: 按重量计费，进口重量税。The company had to pay substantial import poundage on the shipment. 该公司不得不为这批货物支付大量的进口重量税。

quiz.question: disengage ____
quiz.explanation: 脱离，脱离齿轮。Remember to disengage gear before starting the engine. 记得在启动发动机前脱离齿轮。

quiz.question: ______ miscarriage
quiz.explanation: 流产，悲惨的流产。The couple grieved after experiencing a tragic miscarriage. 这对夫妇在经历悲惨的流产后悲痛不已。

quiz.question: _____ wreckage
quiz.explanation: 残骸，飞机残骸。Investigators combed through the plane wreckage looking for clues. 调查人员仔细搜查飞机残骸寻找线索。

quiz.question: ______ rummage
quiz.explanation: 翻找，车库大甩卖。She found a vintage lamp at the neighborhood garage rummage sale. 她在邻居的车库大甩卖上找到了一盏复古台灯。

quiz.question: ____ plumage
quiz.explanation: 羽毛，鸟类羽毛。The peacock displayed its magnificent bird plumage to attract a mate. 孔雀展示其华丽的鸟类羽毛以吸引配偶。

quiz.question: orphanage ____
quiz.explanation: 孤儿院，孤儿院之家。The children grew up in a small orphanage home in the countryside. 孩子们在乡下的一个小孤儿院之家长大。

quiz.question: ______ carnage
quiz.explanation: 大屠杀，血腥大屠杀。The battlefield was a scene of bloody carnage after the fight. 战斗后，战场上是一片血腥大屠杀的景象。

quiz.question: _______ rampage
quiz.explanation: 暴怒，暴力狂暴。The angry mob went on a violent rampage through the city streets. 愤怒的暴徒在城市街道上进行暴力狂暴。

quiz.question: overage ___
quiz.explanation: 超龄，超龄费。The rental car company charged an overage fee for the extra miles. 租车公司对额外里程收取超龄费。

quiz.question: enrage _____
quiz.explanation: 激怒，激怒人群。The politician's insensitive comments would enrage crowd at the rally. 这位政治家的冷漠言论会激怒集会上的人群。

quiz.question: forage ___ ____
quiz.explanation: 觅食，觅食。The squirrels would forage for food to prepare for winter. 松鼠会觅食为冬天做准备。

quiz.question: ______ outrage
quiz.explanation: 愤怒，公众愤怒。The scandal sparked widespread public outrage across the nation. 这起丑闻在全国范围内引发了广泛的公众愤怒。

quiz.question: discourage ______
quiz.explanation: 阻止，阻止努力。Don't let failure discourage effort to achieve your goals. 不要让失败阻止你实现目标的努力。

quiz.question: _____ visage
quiz.explanation: 面容，人类面容。The ancient statue bore a serene human visage carved in marble. 这座古代雕像有着用大理石雕刻的宁静人类面容。

quiz.question: _____ parentage
quiz.explanation: 出身，皇室出身。The prince's royal parentage gave him certain privileges. 王子的皇室出身给了他某些特权。

quiz.question: __________ sabotage
quiz.explanation: 破坏，工业破坏。The factory was shut down due to suspected industrial sabotage. 由于涉嫌工业破坏，工厂被关闭。

quiz.question: ____ lovage
quiz.explanation: 欧当归，欧当归草本植物。The chef used fresh herb lovage to flavor the soup. 厨师用新鲜的欧当归草本植物给汤调味。

quiz.question: cadge _ ____
quiz.explanation: 乞讨，讨个便车。He tried to cadge a ride from strangers at the gas station. 他试图在加油站向陌生人讨个便车。

quiz.question: ______ ledge
quiz.explanation: 窗台，窗台。A pigeon perched on the narrow window ledge outside. 一只鸽子栖息在外面狭窄的窗台上。

quiz.question: _____ fledge
quiz.explanation: 羽翼丰满，幼鸟羽翼丰满。The baby birds were ready to young fledge and leave the nest. 幼鸟已经准备好羽翼丰满离开巢穴了。

quiz.question: ____ sledge
quiz.explanation: 雪橇，雪橇。Children rode their snow sledge down the snowy hillside. 孩子们乘着雪橇滑下雪坡。

quiz.question: _____ dredge
quiz.explanation: 挖泥，河道挖泥。Workers used a river dredge to clear the harbor of sediment. 工人使用河道挖泥机清理港口的沉积物。

quiz.question: ____ midge
quiz.explanation: 蠓，微小的蠓。Swarms of tiny midge hovered over the lake at dusk. 黄昏时分，成群的微小蠓在湖面上盘旋。

quiz.question: dodge ______
quiz.explanation: 躲避，躲避子弹。The action hero managed to dodge bullet in slow motion. 动作英雄设法慢动作躲避子弹。

quiz.question: dislodge _____
quiz.explanation: 移除，移除石头。The workers struggled to dislodge stone from the blocked drain. 工人们努力从堵塞的排水管中移除石头。

quiz.question: won't _____
quiz.explanation: 移动，不肯移动。The stubborn mule won't budge no matter how hard they pushed. 无论他们怎么用力推，这头固执的骡子都不肯移动。

quiz.question: ___ smudge
quiz.explanation: 污迹，墨水污迹。There was an ugly ink smudge on the important document. 重要文件上有一个难看的墨水污迹。

quiz.question: ____ _ nudge
quiz.explanation: 轻推，轻轻推一下。She would give a nudge to wake him up during the boring lecture. 她会在无聊的讲座中轻轻推一下叫醒他。

quiz.question: ____ trudge
quiz.explanation: 跋涉，缓慢跋涉。The exhausted hikers began a slow trudge back to base camp. 筋疲力尽的徒步旅行者开始缓慢跋涉回到大本营。

quiz.question: allege _____
quiz.explanation: 声称，声称犯罪。The prosecutor would allege crime without sufficient evidence. 检察官会在没有足够证据的情况下声称犯罪。

quiz.question: ____ obliged
quiz.explanation: 感到有义务，感到有义务。She didn't feel obliged to attend the party if she was tired. 如果她累了，她不觉得有义务参加聚会。

quiz.question: _______ vestige
quiz.explanation: 遗迹，古代遗迹。Archaeologists discovered an ancient vestige of a lost civilization. 考古学家发现了一个失落文明的古代遗迹。

quiz.question: _____ water
quiz.explanation: 舱底水，舱底水。The crew had to pump out the foul-smelling bilge water from the ship. 船员不得不从船上抽出散发恶臭的舱底水。

quiz.question: ___ bulge
quiz.explanation: 凸出，眼睛凸出。His eyes would eye bulge in surprise at the shocking news. 听到令人震惊的消息，他的眼睛会惊讶地凸出。

quiz.question: divulge ______
quiz.explanation: 泄露，泄露秘密。He refused to divulge secret despite intense interrogation. 尽管受到严厉审问，他仍拒绝泄露秘密。

quiz.question: ______ blancmange
quiz.explanation: 牛奶冻，奶油牛奶冻。The dessert table featured a wobbly creamy blancmange. 甜点桌上有一个摇摇晃晃的奶油牛奶冻。

quiz.question: ______ derange
quiz.explanation: 精神错乱，精神错乱。The trauma caused a mental derange that required treatment. 创伤导致了需要治疗的精神错乱。

quiz.question: prearrange _______
quiz.explanation: 预先安排，预先安排会议。They decided to prearrange meeting to ensure everyone could attend. 他们决定预先安排会议以确保每个人都能参加。

quiz.question: scavenge ____
quiz.explanation: 拾荒，拾荒寻找食物。Wild dogs would scavenge food from garbage dumps at night. 野狗在夜间会从垃圾场拾荒寻找食物。

quiz.question: unhinge ____
quiz.explanation: 使失常，使精神失常。The horrific experience would unhinge mind of the traumatized witness. 这次可怕的经历会使受创伤的证人精神失常。

quiz.question: cringe __ ____
quiz.explanation: 畏缩，恐惧地畏缩。The frightened child would cringe in fear at loud noises. 受惊的孩子会因巨大的噪音而恐惧地畏缩。

quiz.question: singe ____
quiz.explanation: 烧焦，烧焦头发。The candle flame was close enough to singe hair on his arm. 蜡烛火焰近到足以烧焦他手臂上的头发。

quiz.question: ______ tinge
quiz.explanation: 一丝，一丝色彩。The autumn leaves showed a slight tinge of red and gold. 秋叶显示出一丝红色和金色。

quiz.question: ____ ___ swinge
quiz.explanation: 鞭打，鞭打和抽打。Medieval punishments would flog and swinge criminals publicly. 中世纪的惩罚会公开鞭打和抽打罪犯。

quiz.question: _____ twinge
quiz.explanation: 刺痛，剧烈刺痛。She felt a sharp twinge in her back when lifting the box. 她在搬箱子时感到背部一阵剧烈刺痛。

quiz.question: _______ lunge
quiz.explanation: 猛冲，向前猛冲。The fencer made a swift forward lunge at his opponent. 击剑手向对手做出了一个迅速的向前猛冲。

quiz.question: scrounge _____
quiz.explanation: 搜寻，搜寻钱。The broke student tried to scrounge money for bus fare. 这个身无分文的学生试图搜寻钱来买公交车票。

quiz.question: _____ barge
quiz.explanation: 驳船，货物驳船。The cargo barge slowly made its way down the canal. 货物驳船缓慢地沿着运河前进。

quiz.question: __ ___ verge
quiz.explanation: 边缘，在...边缘。The company was on the verge of bankruptcy before the bailout. 公司在救助前处于破产的边缘。

quiz.question: ______ converge
quiz.explanation: 汇聚，力量汇聚。Multiple military units would forces converge at the strategic location. 多个军事单位的力量会在战略位置汇聚。

quiz.question: disgorge ________
quiz.explanation: 吐出，吐出内容物。The volcano would disgorge contents of hot lava and ash. 火山会吐出热熔岩和灰烬的内容物。

quiz.question: ______ upsurge
quiz.explanation: 激增，突然激增。There was a sudden upsurge in demand for the popular product. 对这种流行产品的需求出现了突然激增。

quiz.question: _____ deluge
quiz.explanation: 洪水，大洪水。The biblical story tells of a great deluge that covered the earth. 圣经故事讲述了一场覆盖地球的大洪水。

quiz.question: gouge ___
quiz.explanation: 挖出，挖出。The sculptor would gouge out sections of wood with a chisel. 雕刻家会用凿子挖出木头的部分。
